DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units on behalf of the signed-in user, for those hidden groups and administrative units that the signed-in user has access to.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups or administrative units on your behalf, for those hidden groups or adminstrative units that you have access to.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.
